author: nothingface0
body:
#### PR description:

This PR provides fixes and new arguments to the existing `personalPlayback.py` script, which is an easy way to simulate how DQM works in production and playback, locally.

Add arguments for `run_key` (was hardcoded to `pp_run`), scram arch (also hardcoded to a deprecated value), add search path for `cmsset_default.sh` on cvmfs, fix log call, fix temporary file write mode. 


#### PR validation:

Will provide usage examples soon.
title: [DQM] Fixes for personalPlayback.py
